## EthersLiquity.claimCollateralSurplus() method

Claim leftover collateral after a liquidation or redemption.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
claimCollateralSurplus(overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./arth-lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [EthersTransactionFailedError](./arth-lib-ethers.etherstransactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.

## Remarks

Use [getCollateralSurplusBalance()](./arth-lib-base.readableliquity.getcollateralsurplusbalance.md) to check the amount of collateral available for withdrawal.
